content:
Hello everyone,

we have finally launched "DeiC Dataverse" - the Danish National Repository for Research Data, available to all eight universities in Denmark: https://dataverse.deic.dk/
It has been a very long and bumpy road with many unexpected turns and I would like to thank everyone in the Community for your generous help, and in particular @Philip Durbin üêâ and @Philipp Conzett . Personally, it has been a great pleasure for me to get to know you and learn about all the amazing things that you are doing around Dataverse. This Community is amazing and I hope to be part of it for many years to come.

All the best wishes from Denmark,
Falco

@Falco (Copenhagen University Library) it was nice meeting you in Braga! Congrats on the launch! If you'd like DeiC Dataverse to be on the map at please create an issue here. It's always exciting to add a new country to our community!

@Falco (Copenhagen University Library) and the rest of the DeiC Dataverse team: Congrats on the launch! Good to see there are now three national Dataverse installations in the Scandinavian countries: DeiC Dataverse (DK), DATICE (IS), and DataverseNO (NO). :+1:
